scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a seated figure, likely a king or patriarch, wearing a crown and a long beard, holding a crozier. He is positioned on a cloud. Above and behind him, an angel with large wings is descending, seemingly placing the crown on his head or bestowing a blessing. To the left, another figure, possibly a prophet or saint, is shown with hands clasped in prayer, also appearing to be on clouds. The background is filled with stylized clouds and horizontal lines suggesting a celestial or ethereal setting.
